title: 3legant Golf - E-commerce Landing Page
description: Fully responsive landing page for 3legant, a fictional golf e-commerce company. This site seamlessly adapts to various screen sizes, offering a polished and user-friendly interface that reflects the elegance and precision associated with the game of golf.

title: Alexandra's Hair Style - Services page
description: This project is a fully responsive website for 'Alexandra's Hair Style'. The website is designed to display all available services with easy navigation, ensuring accessibility across devices.
